title.rendered: Kids Latex Feel Foam Aero Pillow (13x19x3″)

content.rendered:
CLASSIC SHAPE: 

Rise & Shine’s Kids pillows are the traditional shape smaller size pillows, which will help the child sleep better.

 

LATEX COMFORT® FOAM: 

If you prefer soft pillows then our Latex Comfort® pillows are the perfect choice for you. Super Soft foam with latex feel is similar to natural rubber in terms of bounce and faster response time, the Pillow Remains cool because of the cooling technology which the pillow has. The Latex Comfort® Foam also has few advantages over Natural Rubber like the pillows will never form knots, create lumps or collapse after sometime.

 

AERO TECHNOLOGY: 

Sync into the aero comfort to allow your pillow have the maximum ventilation of air with the pin core technology so that the temperature of the pillow is regulated while you sleep. It helps reduce the heat and gives you a cooler experience. The Latex Feel Foam pads have Pinholes to make the pillow breathable.

 

SPECIAL FEATURES:

  • Pillow Remains Cool while Using
  • Neck & Shoulder pain relief
  • Air Flow Technology for Refreshing Sleep
  • Relief from Sleep problems
  • Retains original shape after each use, Unlike Polyfill/Cotton pillows our pillows will not sag.
  • Total Value for Money

 

INNER COVER: 

We provide our pillows with two layers of jersey. The basic being a soft material to protect the pillow.

 

PREMIUM OUTER COVER: 

We provide a Premium fabric as our Outer Cover for the Pillows. It is Antiallergenic, eco-friendly and Easy to Care. Do not hand wash or use machine, only Spot clean by hand with warm water and mild detergent.

WE ASSURE: 

Our Pillows are made up of 100% filler-free foam. We have tested our pillows in lab and have a strict quality check before it is dispatched. Our pillows are of high density foam so be assured that it will be your companion for long. We provide One year limited warranty. Please check our Warranty section.

 

Our Pillows will be tightly rolled packed, kindly cut the plastic carefully and then enjoy your pillow coming back to its original shape within 24-48 Hours. Latex Feel pillows may contain air bubbles which may seem as if foam has holes but they are part of moulded foam and they do not affect the quality of the pillow.

excerpt.rendered: Rise & Shine’s Aero Latex Feel Kids Pillow is one of the most luxurious Kids Pillow. Specially designed for Children these pillows are sized such a way that the child can sleep for full night without disturbing their parents. Studies have shown that kids who regularly get an adequate amount of sleep have improved attention, behaviour, learning, memory, and overall mental and physical health. The pillow has the bounce back feel giving the perfect support to the Neck & shoulder.
